website_summaries.verdict: Excellent image quality, an affordable price and best-in-class Roku TV smarts propel the TCL 6-Series into the pole position of the midrange TV race.
pros: Excellent overall image quality, with deep black levels, impressive brightness, rich contrast and more accurate color than last year
Its Roku platform is the best available
The TV handles both HDR10 and Dolby Vision
cons: Brightness and video processing fall short of some more expensive TVs
No AirPlay or Apple TV app (yet)

customer_reviews.title: Motion is terrible
customer_reviews.text: This TV looks great. PROS - vibrant, price, PQ Cons - Feet are wide, motion could be better, upscaling could be better. the motion ruins this TV for me, its very stuttery when watching 24p content
customer_reviews.author: Brantley

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken!
customer_reviews.text: UPS should be awarded with a gold medal for the way they handle goods. The TV arrived in poor condition - the box was already half open and damaged badly. I was really excited and looking forward to set up the TV. I have ordered a replacement and the most painful thing is that there is no way to track when the replacement would arrive.
customer_reviews.author: Gagan

customer_reviews.title: I've received TWO. Both completely defective.
customer_reviews.text: I'm now in the process of handling my second return of the 55R625's to Amazon within the course of a week because both displays were defective out of the box. Exact same issue as you can see in the customer images from other reviewers. Amazing and baffling that this is clearly such a prevalent issue. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: NickSaban

customer_reviews.title: Defective.
customer_reviews.text: Recieved today with a defective screen. Lost the TCL lottery! I'm done. Bought a Sony x950G instead! Out of box built quality significantly better. Amazon return pickup was very smooth and fast. But so far credit for return is sllloooowwww. Still waitng.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful TV, bad experience
customer_reviews.text: First, this is a gorgeous tv! No doubt about it, it's better than the Samsung it replaces. The bezel is miniscule. That's about all I can say positively about it today. It arrived damaged. The damage seems superficial on the box, but it appears someone used the straps as a handle, and may have dropped it. Maybe a design flaw in packaging? No idea which part in the delivery chain is responsible, but the net result is that I was happy to get this TV until I opened the box. I have stated a return, and will update this review once that is processed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon deal shopper

customer_reviews.title: Another broken set...
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived looking reasonably in good shape though there was only 1 strap around it holding it together. Opened it up and everything looked good. Decided to grab the side of the TV to put in place (maybe the tiniest amount of pressure on the corner of the screen since the bezel is so small) and then I saw the screen just dissolve into a cracked mess. This thing is absurdly fragile given the amount of negative reviews. I thought this was mostly on shipping but I think it goes beyond that. TCL needs to do a revision to the packaging and reconsider the materials used for the actual screen. I will not be buying this TV again.
customer_reviews.author: Jestin

customer_reviews.title: Faulty screen out of box
customer_reviews.text: I had read great reviews on these sets so pulled the trigger on a 2019 55" 6 series early, hoping rumors about a panel lottery were exaggerated... unfortunately I lost that lottery (see image). In the middle of returning the set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Meh. Didn’t work when I turned it on (could only see 30% of the picture). I’m sure this is a great tv but since the one I got didn’t work I can’t tell you if it’s good. Seems to be quality control issue
customer_reviews.author: JLong

customer_reviews.title: Broken in Shipping
customer_reviews.text: Putting a 1 star review for now. Came broken in shipping. Will update when replacement comes in. I know the tv is good, but this is unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Rose

customer_reviews.title: Not up to par.
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this one, but had to return, one- tv was cosmetically damaged in shipping, two-HDMI audio over ARC cuts out every 30 seconds or so for about a second. Glare on this TV is bad. The Roku on it is awesome, but that's about all. The picture is ok, but motion handling is not good: it's either juddery or you get soap opera effect. I bought the Hisense H9F and it's way better. I compared them side by side and the picture and quality of the H9F is unmistakably better and the audio over HDMI ARC works.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Pawlicki

customer_reviews.title: CRACKED SCREEN UPON DELIVERY, LIKE EVERYONE ELSE
customer_reviews.text: I'm blown away at being a recipient of a broken screen, like so many other reviewers. Before I even got it out of the box, I saw and felt the cracks in the screen. A big circular shaped one in the top middle and then it spreader horizontally from there.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan N

customer_reviews.title: Cracked liquid display crystal
customer_reviews.text: An alarming number of reviews mentioned the "broken out of the box" criticism. I should of known better than to gamble on the QC problems being resolved, but unfortunately the local Best Buy does not get this 2019, QLED until the Spring so I gambled and lost.
customer_reviews.author: John May

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with Broken screen
customer_reviews.text: Like many others my TV arrived with a broken screen. It looked fine in and out of the box but upon plugging it in you could see that the inside was cracked resulting in no picture. Not sure if it was a problem with manufacturing or in delivery as it did not seem to be anchored to the inside of the freight truck that brought it and if the box fell over during transit this would be exactly the type of damage you would see. Despite the inconvenience of having to be home for delivery, and return, and again for another delivery I ordered another one. Let’s hope it arrives without damage next time.
customer_reviews.author: John Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Get this tv. Right meow
customer_reviews.text: There might be better 65 inch tvs out there $2k+, but there can't be a better price to quality ratio on the market. This is a very good to great 65 inch QLED TV, for $799. Whaaaaaat.
customer_reviews.author: David Watts

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Recieved broken in a damaged box. Returned with no problems
customer_reviews.author: Kman

customer_reviews.title: motion is average, sharp edges at corners, very nice picture
customer_reviews.text: The picture is beautiful, with great blacks and colours. I agree that there is some motion issue as it isn't as good at displaying a football game as my 8 year old 1080p Vizio that it replaces. Turning off action smoothing seems to show more ball than otherwise. I easily picked it up and placed it on the wall myself but did receive a cut on my right palm from the sharp edges. For $800.00 it seems to be a good if not top choice for its movie prowess, as far as sports go.. well after all there are only 19 games a season here in New England.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian J. Lind

customer_reviews.title: Best 'Budget TV' Out There for 2019
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from the 2017 model and have not been disappointed at all! The QLED technology helps deliver an amazing picture for 4K streaming and gaming that is noticeable instantly. Roku interface is the most user friendly in my opinion. Setup took under 5 minutes. I would recommend this TV to anyone as i feel it rivals TV's that are near double its price!
customer_reviews.author: tates23

customer_reviews.title: Great Picture but it's full of bugs that need to be worked out.
customer_reviews.text: I received the TV today but it's very glitchy. The operating system overwhelms the unit's weak processor and the TV keeps resetting itself. It also keeps disconnecting from the internet and there's something wrong with the unit's Clear QAM tuner. When I initiate the scan of available channels the TV freezes and resets itself without finalizing the process. I should have known better than to purchase a newly released model. The first lot(s) are usually full of bugs and glitches that do not get worked out until second production.
customer_reviews.author: Leo M.

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: I was so gentle setting up my broken TV. What a waist of time...bummer. Does anyone have better suggestion than TCL
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Great tv. Great price
customer_reviews.text: Tv arrived at 630 am. Unreal in Pittsburgh. Right from air freight. Was packed very well. The box lifts up after cutting bands. I love the tv. Just had one day. Settings was easy. Set up a Comcast remote. The entire set up roku. Comcast. Open box. Was about 30 min. WiFi was very easy. Picture quality. As good as a Sony. For 599. Can’t beat it. Tv in box about 55 lbs. 40 out of box. Legs attach in seconds. I’m short it’s acawesome tv. Get the 6 series.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Roku features don't work
customer_reviews.text: Worst remote ever and it's sold as a Roku TV I had to reset my TV many time which is a pain in the ass with this crappy remote. None of the Roku features work. TCL TVs might be fine. And the picture and sound are fine but it's sold as a ROKU TV. If those features don't work then it's not what the say it is which makes me unlikely to trust TCL in any other things they say. Also as noted in other reviews first TV came with a busted screen. Amazon was great about but they shouldn't have had to be.
customer_reviews.author: Jack William Finley

customer_reviews.title: Beyond Expectations
customer_reviews.text: This TV goes well beyond my (high) expectations. The picture, especially in 4K, is incredible. The colors are deep and gorgeous. Watching sports has been fantastic. The Roku interface is my first experience with it and I’m impressed. I can’t imagine there is a better 65” TV for less than $1,200, let alone $800.
customer_reviews.author: Richard M.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome TV for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I researched what the best tvs were currently and TCL was listed as one of the best. When I saw the price for a 55" I figured why not try it especially during the pandemic where watching tv was most of the days activities. The picture is amazing. I don't understand these people talking about blurriness because I haven't notice any issues. If you are a normal person who watches tv and movies you will be very happy w/ this. We are now cutting the cable cord thanks to this smart tv and only have internet w/ a HDTV antenna hooked up to watch free channels and Disney+. Getting this TV has saved us so much money, definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bedroom tv
customer_reviews.text: I'm loving this TV. I received mine unbroken & I think it makes a perfect bedroom TV. This TV is mainly used to stream & I have to say everything is great. Even the built in speakers are good. My only negative is I feel it's a bit thick but I'm spoiled from my main TV being an oled. I've played a few Xbox one games including first person shooters & the motion is fine for me. No input lag at all when in game mode.
customer_reviews.author: andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Great value for a great quality picture and sound. Of course you would want to add a sound bar for a more immersive experience, but for our bedroom, the sound quality is fine. UHD quality is great. I tested this with Netflix UHD content. It did take some fiddling to achieve the best quality. I had to take my Netflix account out of "auto" mode and force high quality. But you can do that on profile basis. I'm still working with Amazon Prime and YouTubeTV to achieve better quality. But this is an Amazon and YouTube TV issue. Just because your TV can handle UHD, doesn't mean they are going to give it to you. Very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: vanv

customer_reviews.title: Not a good experience
customer_reviews.text: I heard nothing but rants a raves about this TV. I received the TV just a few hours before writing this review. The box looked like someone opened it and tried to repackage it. Once I finally got over this and decided since everything appears good, I get it mounted and make all the connections and then go to power it on only to be stuck in a recovery mode that asks to choose a language but is not selectable... what a big waste of my time and money. TCL support are no where to be found, offices are closed apparently.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value QLED
customer_reviews.text: Received our set 5/4/20. Carton in perfect shape on delivery, TV screen perfect, no cracks and no dead pixels. Upgraded from a 1 year old series 2 TCL. This one blows it away in every aspect. Exquisite picture, focus and brightness. Probably the best value around with the QLED screen. We think the ROKU interface is the best and so easy to use. Only one drawback is the super ugly feet/stand. They look totally out of place being on the edge instead of moved in 8-10 inches. Other than that we are very satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: dave99

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect, but damn good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for the covid19 quarantine, no regrets. What I really like: - Image quality. It's bright, it's vibrant, 4k Dolby Vision looks stunning. - Roku TV is easy to use. - Good build quality. TV is slim and slick. What I don't like: - TV legs. I bought a tabletop TV stand and just not use it. - Roku is Roku. I've only been streaming Netflix and Hulu and haven't really encountered the infamous motion issues yet. I'm sure it's there, but it doesn't seem like it's a big problem if streaming is all you do.
customer_reviews.author: Linh Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: 60hz panel not 240hz
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted to give this tv 5 stars for how amazing it is yet it is advertised as "natural motion 240" refresh rate leading me to believe it was 240 hz panel. It's a 60hz. Panel and it isn't the best. The software built in for making a smooth experience feel like a higher refresh rate are great but I can't support feeling tricked. I won't return because I'm happy with the TV and it's beyond incredible for the price but I want others to see this and tcl to with these fluff words making their products sound better than they are.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Reed

customer_reviews.title: No banding!
customer_reviews.text: Everything I loved about the original 6-series (that I returned) but without the banding. No problems with the display so far, super satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Maddie

customer_reviews.title: My new Favorite TV
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I wanted above the bottom rung - but not the most expensive - nice features, decent size and this TV delivers. I was already a devoted Roku user and this has excellent Roku implementation. It even decodes my live TV broadcasts from my Plex server/Silicon Dust. Simple remote but does everything you need to. In dark movies/shows the contrast still isn't what I want but way better then I had. I really like this TV.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, lousy TV
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy. Ripoff. And for sure do not have Amazon Home Service install unless you want thieves, liars and poorly trained people in your home.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Cope White

customer_reviews.title: Great product for its price, would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: The TV is really great. I generally am very skeptical to purchase from outside of my comfort brands. But after I got the TCL 55inch QLED TV, I guess I can say that it really does make up to all the great reviews I read online. The picture quality is really great, I would love to have a better sound system, but I guess that varies from person to person depending on the use case. The design is pretty great too, only issue being that the stand is at the edges of the Tv, which requires you to have a larger TV stand.
customer_reviews.author: Sarvesh DK

customer_reviews.title: Not working straight out of the box, retrying.
customer_reviews.text: Just received the TV, no visible external damage to box, plugged it in and the screen was totally screwed up, gobbledygook. Sending back and waiting for replacement. If we get same results, we won’t be buying TCL. Now, with all that said, we believe in giving them (TCL) a second chance to make it right. So let’s see what happens.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Huffman

customer_reviews.title: Arrived withg a broken screen
customer_reviews.text: I got mine today and was excited to set it up. I noted some dents and creases on the box right away. Unfortunately, when I opened the top, I could see that some of the styrofoam was broken. I finished unwrapping, and plugged it in, and sure enough the screen was broken in several places. Obviously I returned it- I don't think I'll take another chance with this TV.
customer_reviews.author: AeroMan

customer_reviews.title: Best quality you can buy that's seeable to the eye. The quantum dot tech is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Best tv I've ever had by far. Everything about it from the os, to the picture quality. Just wait till youmplay some 60fps 4k video, it looks insane! I couldn't believe it. No banding or any other weirdness everyone else talks about, everything is flawless. People say for the money it's so good, while that's true, it's just one of the best TV's out there. Don't hesitate, buy, it's awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Jader F.

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't turn  it on!
customer_reviews.text: Could not get it to turn on. No power. TCL customer service tried very hard to figure it out and Amazon customer service was very helpful. After a couple of days I had to make a decision: have a technician come and look and decide what was wrong then order parts, etc - a process that could take up to 3 weeks ,or get a refund, or get a replacement which was going to take a couple of weeks. I opted for the refund. Amazon was very helpful in this process. I may still try again for the tv later.
customer_reviews.author: Gary L Clayton

customer_reviews.title: Tv was delivered damaged
customer_reviews.text: The TV cane damaged and I immediately had to file a claim to return it. I’ve been waiting for this model to get released so this is very upsetting.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Mattle

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I think TCL TVs are the best value on the market today. I got the 65R625. It's huge, and the picture is gorgeous. I love the embedded ROKU operating system (this is my 2nd TCL ROKU TV). If I buy another TV it too would be TCL. Seller is great too. Days after I ordered the TV they lowered the price; I contacted them and they kindly refunded the difference to me. Outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: SKlaszky

customer_reviews.title: Big and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 65” QLED version, and it’s amazing. Picture quality is so good for this price. Setup was easy, the Roku operating system is preferable to others. The feet are wide, right at the edge of the TV which is too wide for my TV table, so I bought a generic TV stand that raises the tv a little and swivels. I also have a sound bar that improves the sound, which isn’t great but typical for flat screens.
customer_reviews.author: Travis T. Foss

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: This television is absolutely amazing, very high quality picture, colors, and sound, it is fabulous! A huge value for the low price & size of screen! It is so easy to navigate, and to use w/our Fire TV & PS4 game system. Definitely a great purchase in every way!
customer_reviews.author: Dessa R. Mawdesley

customer_reviews.title: A good value in it's price range.
customer_reviews.text: It does have a great picture, and works great for movies at night. The glare on the screen in bright rooms is not terrible, but also not great. The sound quality is pretty decent, doesn't have a cheap tinny sound. Sports do appear to be choppy because of the 60Hz refresh rate, but everything else seems very fluid. However, you can still enjoy sports on this TV. Overall, a very good value for a 65" Roku TV.
customer_reviews.author: Knutts

customer_reviews.title: Picture is  grat out of the box. BUT.....Roku audio, ARC, doesn workc properly.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic picture quality, all formats. The upscaled HD looks almost as the UHD HDR. I do my own calibration by computer and can confirm that a gray scale is close to perfect. BUT, quality check issue. Roku streaming picture looks goot. ARC doesn't recognizing any audio mode and running through only stereo PCM signal. Manual choice of DD+ producing only loud distorted sound. I beleive this TV is great addition to home theater, with AVR for best experience. Now I have to look for another streaming source option.
customer_reviews.author: Legin

customer_reviews.title: This is what you get to see when it is turned on.
customer_reviews.text: I hate to even give it a one. This TV was really nice for the first 3 months then one evening I turned it one to see what you see in the picture attached. Amazon will not do anything about other than suggest I contact the manufacturer. This is the TCL 55" Class 6-Series 4K UHD QLED Dolby VISION HDR Roku Smart TV - 55R625.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Haughton

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic picture quality
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy a TCL tv, but the reviews were so good I gave it a whirl for the bedroom tv. I’ve had pioneer plasma, panny plasma and currently have various Samsung lcd’s in the house, and this TCL beats em all in picture quality. HDR material is exquisite and hi def looks much better than on my 75” Samsung in the living room. So much so I’m ordering the 8 series 75” for my living room. Roku is easy to use also...So is the app that allows you to calibrate the gamma
customer_reviews.author: S.S.

customer_reviews.title: Best TV for the Money
customer_reviews.text: I was shopping for TV's in the $1k range when I stumbled upon great reviews for this TCL 55R625. After purchase and a quick setup, I was shocked at both the quality of the physical TV as well as the picture. This TV has local dimming so the contrast is awesome. My only slight complaint is the 60hz refresh rate. Most decent sets with this picture quality are 120hz. However, with the Action Smoothing setting on "high", most of the judder is removed. Overall, a great TV for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin N

customer_reviews.title: Smashed screen
customer_reviews.text: Waited in great anticipation for this tv because I really wanted it when it finally got to me the screen was smashed and had to send back, that was my second time to order a tv on line so I gave i just gave up.
customer_reviews.author: Big B

customer_reviews.title: It is very easy to install, and very flexible in how you can use it.
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased a smaller 4k TCL for my bedroom to experiment with eliminating the hubs, programed power and HDMI switches and routines I created to use Alexa to control my entertainment devices. It worked out very well, so when the R6 version was announced, I bought one of the first R6's available on Amazon. It has turned out to be a great decision in picture quality, and the removal of a snake pit of wiring, hubs, switches, and special programming. I also enjoy a matching TCL sound system with the BlueTooth base speaker. Very economical and flexible in the use of space, easy to look at, easy to use, set itself up (correctly), and no speaker wires.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E Buckley

customer_reviews.title: Great looking TV
customer_reviews.text: Great TV for the price. Biggest fear was DOA or broken in shipping but neither was the case here, hit the TCL jackpot twice in a row :D. Still waiting on optical cable to connect receiver for true surround sound and will update if that works or not since I saw other reviews say this was an issue, will see tomorrow. Optical output to my receiver seems to work well as well no real configuration needed, plug and play.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Husain

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy this TV.  And not from this seller, especially.
customer_reviews.text: See pic for what I got when I plugged in my new TV. Not a good thing to see right out of the box. And the quality of service I received from both Amazon and the seller after calling was not good. Very disappointed as a regular high-volume Amazon shopper.
customer_reviews.author: Antny3

customer_reviews.title: NIce!
customer_reviews.text: Enjoying the great picture quality whether viewing broadcast, movies or football/hockey. Definitely recommend following picture setting suggestions from CNET or similar. Also added sound bar for better audio performance. Family member just purchased their (2019) 6-series TCL due to our recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: sauer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful picture
customer_reviews.text: There are cheaper sets and much more expensive sets, but this one has great sound, excellent picture (best I've seen after many sets and shopping) and mounts easily. I would definitely buy again. Only downside is on some (not all) motion on certain backgrounds (not all) the item in primary focus has a muddy outline. Hard to describe but very minor and fleeting and usually not distracting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish
customer_reviews.text: My ex-girlfriend took this TV to her place upon arrival and I haven't seen her since. I've heard from friends its one hell of a TV though! .... Still watching my Sylvania Super set, which is far more reliable than she was :-)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for price
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this television for the price. I’m a big fan of Roku enables devices as it typically makes it a lot easier to do everything on one remote. We hooked this up to a Sonos sound bar though and can not sync the Roku remote to the Sonos when connected via Optical cord. You will want to make sure that your picture is in the correct mode when switching between sports and movies. This is very easy via e Roku remote. I have not used the sound since we have it hooked into Sonos. It is aesthetically pleasing as well.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Does not work,beware
customer_reviews.text: Reset TV many times, since September, Called help desk many times to have the tv program reset step by step. We've lost out patience. Go to put TV on and all we get is black screen. For the money we paid this TV is nothing but a headache and waste of money. Did thorough research before purchasing. It seems other buyers are having the same problem with this TV.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s just ok, I’m not amazed
customer_reviews.text: Coming from an LG OLED (that I broke by accident), I’m pretty disappointed. I tried to save a few bucks, and it got stellar reviews. But it’s not even close in the picture quality department and the user interface is clunky and laggy. The speakers, in any mode, are disappointing. I guess that’s what you get for a 1/3 the price of a top quality TV. This is great for the masses, or children. It’s not for someone who cares about picture and audio quality. It’s just mediocre in those respects. I really don’t get all the hype. I’m going back to Lg oled, it’s worth the jump in price. This one goes to the basement kids room.
customer_reviews.author: STi555

customer_reviews.title: Best for this price range
customer_reviews.text: I think it would be pretty difficult to find a Better TV at this price range. Pros: Local contrast zones are on point. Great color and clarity Speakers!! I was going to get a sound bar and I passed on it. The speakers that come with this sound great! 25% volume is LOUD! Obviously a sound bar would be better but not dramatic enough for price. GAMING: i play first person shooter games. This tv can keep up with my gaming monitor. I would almost justify that this tv has brighter contrast and colors. CONS: Power cord is super short. If you’re running it through a wall, definitely won’t make it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bright, good motion, poor sound quality.
customer_reviews.text: The picture is good. The motion is good. When looking at black background with white text or something similar you can see the dynamic brightness areas turning on and off. That's my only gripe about picture. In terms of overall brightness, we actually had to turn down the brightness because it was too bright (not over saturated, literally too bright). The sound from the TV is kind of garbage. We already had a sound bar, but decided to give the Roku speakers a try as well, definitely worth it. Don't use the internal speakers unless you just don't care about sound at all.
customer_reviews.author: garrettg84

customer_reviews.title: Broken out of the box -- Recommend you read reviews and choose another brand
customer_reviews.text: Product was defective directly after installation. After the unit rebooted from a system upgrade, it became stuck on its initial red screen. Numerous factory resets were ineffective -- It appears there is a software problem with the upgrade and a hardware problem with the factory reset. Their customer service professional was very friendly, but she explained that it would take a technician 2 weeks to visit us. Overall, there's an understandable concern that if TCL can't deliver a sound product out of the package, how will it last long term? I would highly encourage you to look to other brands such as Vizio, Samsung or LG.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer F.

customer_reviews.title: The best bang for your bucks
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2018 TCL model i wasn't thrilled with the delay on the set. This TCL QLED isthe best of the best. I'm not a gamer. I'm a tv watcher. I'm ordering another one for my bedroom. I've received so many compliments on the picture quality
customer_reviews.author: Shirletta McClinton

customer_reviews.title: Insane value
customer_reviews.text: Did extensive research on this set and glad that I decided to purchase this one instead of the other brands in a similar price range. The only thing I was hesitant about was the frame rate and “ghosting effects” that people spoke of. After using the tv for a few months, I am happy to say that they are non existent in all sources, standard, hdr, and Dolby vision. If you are looking for an amazing tv at a low price point, this is the one to go with.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great tv. Slow refresh rate
customer_reviews.text: Good picture quality for the price. Refresh rate a little slow. Picture doesn't maintain quality well if you're watching a fast paced movie.
customer_reviews.author: Dave's Doors

customer_reviews.title: Such a good deal
customer_reviews.text: The picture is sharp, the colors are bright, the sound is surprisingly good, but the built in Roku absolutely makes this TV. Great interface, has apps for Netflix, Hulu, and streaming apps for Xfinity and most others.
customer_reviews.author: Greg R

customer_reviews.title: Damaged screen
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of buying TCL again since I had to get my last 4k Smart HDR TCL TV repaired within 2 years of purchase. But with glowing reviews for the 6 series everywhere, I decided to give the brand another shot. Unfortunately, it arrived so late and had stained screen spots and damaged pixels all over the screen when turned on, making it impossible to see clearly on the screen. Had to buy packing tape, repack everything, and return it. Huge hassle and disappointment! Waiting for a refund for this soon. In the meanwhile, I went with a 2020 Samsung QLED instead.
customer_reviews.author: Curious Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly Perfect TV
customer_reviews.text: Perfect I’m so many ways. Quality is more than perfect than any high end TV’s and 75 percent cheaper than most. I bought a 65 inch and 75 inch last year and bought another 65 inch for my grandson this year
customer_reviews.author: getty

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic tv at a fantastic price.
customer_reviews.text: This tv is an excellent tv and one of CNets top TV's of 2019. Anyone giving this thing a poor review is either paid to do so or a fanboy of another brand. Great picture, absolutely stunning and easy to set up and calibrate. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin L

customer_reviews.title: Great value QLED TV
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the TV about a month ago and have used it daily. I paid roughly $750 and consider it a great price for the size and picture quality. I love the integrated Roku interface. It’s the first time I’ve ever used Roku but will definitely look for it when purchasing TVs in the future. I purchased the TCL sound bar which was easy to setup and pairs nicely with the television. The reason this TV gets 4 stars from me and not 5 is simply due to the overall picture quality. For Netflix and Hulu it gets the job done and the quality isn’t noticeable, but for sports like football it leaves a lot to be desired.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fragile
customer_reviews.text: They had to replace the TV 3 times as it was delivered with a break the first time, the 2nd time it broke after barely being touched on the frame, i.e., not the glass. After the 3rd TV showed up, they refused to take back the 2nd TV. When I called TCL directly to ask them to take it back, they said I can bring it to the nearest recycling center. How am I supposed to get a 65" TV in my car and why am I supposed to pay to have it recycled. Buy something else, this TV and this company are not reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Mark S

customer_reviews.title: TCL. A great value
customer_reviews.text: Bought this last week and it was installed yesterday. This is in our bedroom and so far I’m very happy with it-picture quality is very similar to our Sony Bravia we already have that was much more expensive. I love the built in Roku and the interface is simple and easy to learn. The QLED is very crisp and only the sound is a bit muddled; an easy fix with a soundbar put in shortly. Installation was a very easy process and they came on time and were courteous and fast.
customer_reviews.author: ki punwar

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: I read the Amazon reviews and Consumer Reports reviews on the 55" TV's and they were right for the money the TCL Roku set would be hard to beat, everyone that has seen my comments on the quality of the picture and of course the built in Roku is great. I am most satisfied with my purchase. No rating on the sound because I have a sound system connected to mine.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: For the price it's a great TV. I've had it for about 3.5 months and I think the picture quality is bright and great to watch. The only thing that could use improvement is the sound quality but most of these very flat TV's are lacking sound quality. You can spend twice as much money on a premier brand TV that won't look any better than this 55" TCL. I'm satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: david223

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent
customer_reviews.text: I was actually looking into a Samsung qled and I accidentally came across this TCL qled way cheaper for the price this is a big upgrade from my old TCL TV with only HDR I would recommend it to anybody to buy this Dolby Vision Dolby Atmos qled 4K HDR pretty sure there's no other TVs that has all of these features if they do you will not get it for the price you get it now $599 can't beat that movie quality stands out feels like I'm actually there watching it happen
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Arrived shattered
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived with the box in good condition so I was hopeful. But of course as soon as I opened it and pulled the TV out there were spiderweb cracks all over the front of the screen like someone had played soccer with it.
customer_reviews.author: kyle q.

customer_reviews.title: Quality vs Price - excellent
customer_reviews.text: No, it's not as crystal clear as the $2500 and up OLED sets, but... the picture is fine. The fact that all my streaming is now on 65" is super. I would recommend a very strong wall mount especially if you want to swing it out like at 45 degrees. The thing is a beast at nearly 60#. All my cable remotes recognize the unit so I can use the cable-remote to turn both on. Nit - Roku still has you click the cable/satellite mode select on power-up, so you still have to use TWO remotes to get you there. This review is about two months in and all good. Enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: John Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Great budget tv
customer_reviews.text: This is by far one of the best budget tv's on the market with premium add ons. The picture quality is what I was impressed with the most. I love the ROKU that is built in. The sound is ok, but I recommend getting a sound bar. Overall, its a great value for the technology. Delivery is scheduled which makes purchasing this super easy.
customer_reviews.author: Coca

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic TCL 65 inch 625
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic picture. Super easy setup with Roku interface. Great upscaling for 1080i broadcasts. Picture and audio setting to Taylor to your taste. Dolby and 4 K UHD are fantastic. See the Dolby Vison picture Compared to the Samsung 65 RU7100 I bought in December this TCL is far better in every respect. Samsung failed in 3 months refused to connect to both wired and WiFi. Samsung has jerked me around since April still waiting for resolution. I highly recommend the TLC 65 inch 625 model.
customer_reviews.author: The Shootist

customer_reviews.title: Great for gaming on ps4 pro
customer_reviews.text: This tv has really nice picture when playing on ps4 pro. Being qled seems to help a lot with the picture. I have a tcl 4 series also and was disappointed with how the ps4 pro looked with that tv. This tv is a noticeable improvement. For me, it excelled in 3 important areas that were important for hdr gaming: 4 k resolution, hdr (increased contrast), and finally wcg. I haven’t played around with the settings but a few times. Really happy with ps4 pro and this tv.
customer_reviews.author: TheRedSky81

customer_reviews.title: Awesome TV
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for the new version of the 6 series TCL TV, which uses the QLED technology. I haven't been disappointed at all. It has an excellent picture. Much better than the entry-level Samsung that it replaced. The sound is good, so I can use the TV sound instead of my surround sound if I don't feel like turning on the surround sound. 4K videos look stunning, and you can sit as close as you want (I have this 55 inch TV in our bedroom) and the picture is never pixelated. Excellent TV, I would highly recommend it, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Hamilton and Dan

customer_reviews.title: Tremendous Value!
customer_reviews.text: It is unfortunate that people are downgrading the TV for what are clearly shipping and handling issues. Very happy with the picture quality - got this TV for football season. No issues for me with motion - can't stand smoothing, so I turned it off. Picture = Great Upscaling = Very Good Sound = Good enough Roku OS = Awesome VALUE FOR MY HARD EARNED MONEY = Excellent
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best 4K UHD HDR T.V. under $1000.
customer_reviews.text: Best T.V. I've ever bought. The 4K HDR picture is stunning and vibrant and the dolbey atmos sound is theatricaly impeccable. I bought this T.V. to play my Xbox One X on and I couldn't have picked a better T.V. for the price. Every time I turn on this T.V. My eye's start to water, it's just that beautiful. Worth every penny of $500. (Pics are Jedi Fallen Order on Xbox One X)
customer_reviews.author: Tparty1776

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money and overall great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: This TV is excellent. I have been a Samsung and Sony guy for the last 20 years. After reading reviews and watching YouTube vids from respected reviewers, I took a chance and I’m glad I did. The TCL 6 series is called the best TV for the dollar and I have to agree. Love the Roku interface. You will not be disappointed with your purchase unless you demand the absolute best and if that’s the case you wouldn’t be reading this!
customer_reviews.author: Duperstar

customer_reviews.title: TCL series-6 55” is a great TV
customer_reviews.text: For the money, this is easily the best television I’ve owned. The pro’s vastly outweigh the cons. The cons are little things like... it is HDMI-incompatible with my Denon receiver. I have to use an optical cable which doesn’t affect the sound quality at all. The remote is functional and easy to use. I would like it if it was lit, but again, that’s minor. The pros are that it is a beautiful picture with rich deep color. It is easy to use and to set up. I spent months looking at TV’s and I’m glad that I settled on this one.
customer_reviews.author: N8ivefl

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic TV for the price!
customer_reviews.text: The picture on this TV is fantastic. Sound is also high def! Plus the operating system is so convenient. 65” QLED UHD 4K for $699.... Shut up and take my money.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Great TV out of the box! Roku platform is fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a great TV! It is very happy where it sits and its owner is also very happy! Lol. I researched TVs before I bought this, and I read on CNET.com that Roku TVs are the best platform for smart TVs. That definitely influenced my decision. This TV has enough inputs, setting up a soundbar was super easy.
customer_reviews.author: DaPrincezz

customer_reviews.title: Picture quality is amazing love this TV
customer_reviews.text: I love this TV. I have it in my bedroom so I don't use it for gaming, but the picture quality is fantastic. It's sleek and beautiful. My brother recommended this TV to me and it's worth every penny. I would recommend to anyone looking for a new TV.
customer_reviews.author: Latisha

customer_reviews.title: TCL 65" Class 6-Series 4K UHD QLED Dolby Vision HDR Roku Smart TV - 65R625
customer_reviews.text: The TCL 6 Series/R625 2019 is a great 4k budget TV with impressive picture quality and low input lag for gaming. It has an excellent contrast ratio, with outstanding black uniformity and a good local dimming feature. It has excellent peak brightness in SDR, and small, bright highlights really pop in HDR. You cant beat the quality of the picture at this price range. the only down side may be the audio fron the tv as it is not the best sounding speakers, But most people will be using a sound bar.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew P.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful picture quality. Gorgeous colors! We previously had a 2014 60" Samsung and the picture with this TV is even nicer. I love all the options that come with Roku TVs. I highly recommend it! I was very nervous about all the comments about getting one with a cracked display but we got lucky!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged - Box still looked good
customer_reviews.text: Got this on sale, with a $100 off coupon. Coupon seems to be a one time use only so I can't reorder this for the same price :( Might update this review once I get a working model at the same price or better.
customer_reviews.author: Wilson Teng

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Wait, but TCL does not stand by their products
customer_reviews.text: Waited months for this TV to be released. Belive the hype. This is a great TV. Shipping was easy and on-time too. Picture quality was great, mounted it on the wall with heavy duty mount then... UPDATE Took the TV down to upgrade some wiring and paint the wall. Took great care to keep it safe but when it wen't back on the wall something inside was cracked. No damage, drop etc . No physical manifestation of damage to the case, just a damaged internal. TCL was terrible to deal with via customer service and offered no recourse. Don't buy from this company.
customer_reviews.author: S. Novak

customer_reviews.title: TCL 55R625
customer_reviews.text: I evaluated several 55" smart TVs from leading manufacturers before purchasing this TCL 55R625 Model. I am very pleased with the picture quality. I did add a TCL sound bar with subwoofer to enhance the sound quality although the original sound wasn't bad at all. Setup was a breeze and I have actually purchased a second to replace a 14 year old television in my refinished basement and have now "cut the cable" on all my televisions. For the price you can't beat the features and quality of this smart television.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Cantwell

customer_reviews.title: Picture and sound are really nice on this TV.
customer_reviews.text: The only bad thing about this TV is darker cornes than other parts of the screen. Also, there is no Bluetooth connection.. Contrast, brightness and colors are amazing. For picture quality I'll give 9.5/10. Sound is really good in Theater mode, no complains about that. My previous LG TV was equipprd with Harman Kardon speakers and I was wondering how bad sound this TCL will have, but I was wrong. For sound my score is 8/10.
customer_reviews.author: Jesenko Elezovic

customer_reviews.title: I Love This 4K TV!
customer_reviews.text: There may be more expensive models on the market but why pay more when this 4K TV delivers one of the best pictures out there. The sets HDR & Dolby Vision are stunning and offer amazing color and deep black levels. The smart features by ROKU are amazing and streaming has never looked better. Do not hesitate to purchase this set; you'll love it as much as I do!
customer_reviews.author: Robert P. Bjorklund II

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic TV
customer_reviews.text: This replaced a 16 yro CRT TV. It's like watching a movie theater screen. Everything about this set is great so far. The colors, resolution, the Roku home screen, the voice command. The audio is good. There is a learning curve to understand all the functionality but you can set it up or figure out most of what you need very quickly. 4k content is amazing. The first show I watched featured the snow covered mountains of Colorado. Just gorgeous.
customer_reviews.author: x-men

customer_reviews.title: This is better than name brand TVs that cost more
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this TV. Normally I think that Roku TVs are very cheap, and yes this is a more cost-efficient TV, but everything looks amazing and the only issue I have is the sound which sometimes sounds like it's being projected behind the TV. You just have to set the picture to your preferences and make sure you turn HDR on.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis Dawley-Hill

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: Did a great deal of research and very happy with choice. Gaming isn’t something we do, so it was really just about Netflix, and other premium channels and occasional dvds. Set up was easy as far as tv goes, but it did take some effort to run it thru my home theatre set up (receiver and 5 speakers). Once that short, painful period was over, no issues. It’s only been 2 weeks, so I guess time will be the judge.UPDATE: 4 months in and am very happy with this purchase. No issues
customer_reviews.author: J. C. Stone

customer_reviews.title: Best value for a TV out there
customer_reviews.text: Best TV I have owned. I luckily won the TV lottery with this brand and I'm so happy I did. The UI is snappy and one can easily navigate through all the apps. The picture quality is stunning and the TV itself just looks beautiful. If your able to get this for 700-800 like I did it it is more than worth your time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Sad tv day
customer_reviews.text: Recived a broken tv just in time for the playoffs :( The tv may not have been new? The tcl box was not taped at the bottom and no batteries were included for the remote
customer_reviews.author: Falconlx

customer_reviews.title: The QLED 4K picture is excellent
customer_reviews.text: This QLED 4K with RUKO is a excellent TV at a great price. Very easy to set everything up like Amazon and Netflix. We run surround sound so I will not rate the TV sound. Very happy with the picture, This is the second TCL TV for our bedrooms. This one is our first QLED which the picture looks about as good as our Samsung 65" QLED in the living room. I have nothing bad to say about the two TCL TV's we own.
customer_reviews.author: pizmobob

customer_reviews.title: TLC 55 4K
customer_reviews.text: Best TLC 6 series ever., i recommend. The Dolby VISION HDR on this TV outstand. You will be amazed with the picture quality. And with Soundcore Infini Pro Integrated 2.1 Channel Soundbar with Dolby Atmos and Built-in Subwoofers. The Sound affect or crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Pena Francisco

customer_reviews.title: Damaged out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Satisfactorily delivered as ordered on Dec 20th. Waited until Xmas Day to open up my new toy. Took it out of the undamaged box, hung on the wall and plugged it in. I was horrified as I then noticed there was spider-web cracks all over the top of the screen. Amazon is now working on sending me a replacement. Not off to a great start!! However, I remain optimistic that once I receive a new, fully-functioning undamaged TV, it will be great!! Merry Christmas to me!! :(
customer_reviews.author: bridget rongner

product_meta.title: TCL 65" Class 6-Series 4K UHD QLED Dolby Vision HDR Roku Smart TV - 65R625
feature_bullets: QLED color technology delivers better brightness and wide color volume to provide exceptionally vivid and lifelike picture performance.
Smart functionality offers access to thousands of streaming channels featuring more than 500,000 movies and TV episodes via Roku TV
Pairs 4K Ultra HD picture clarity with the contrast, color, and detail of Dolby Vision high dynamic range (HDR) for the most lifelike picture
LED backlighting with contrast control zones produce deep blacks and excellent picture quality
Full view design provides a clean, contemporary edge-to-edge glass display that blends seamlessly into your viewing experience
Auto game mode automatically enhances performance by offering the smoothest action, lowest latency and the best picture settings for gaming
Inputs: 4 HDMI (one with HDMI ARC), 1 USB (media player), RF, Composite, Headphone Jack, Optical Audio Out, Ethernet
Dimensions (W x H x D): TV without stand: 56.9" X 32.9" X 3.4", TV with stand: 56.9" X 36.0" X 12.4"
Easy voice control with Alexa and Google Assistant compatibility
